hero.description: Real-time updates, trip planning, and everything you need for navigating New York City's transit system.

features.title: Everything You Need for NYC Transit

updates.realTimeUpdatesDescription: Get live updates on train arrivals, delays, and service changes across all NYC transit lines.

trips.tripPlanningDescription: Plan your journey with our optimized route finder that considers current service conditions.

stations.stationInfoDescription: Access detailed information about stations, including accessibility features and nearby amenities.

footer.description: Your essential companion for navigating New York City's transportation system.
